## Flamingo-UI

Our react components library

## Launch Flamingo

```bash
yarn install
yarn docs
```

## Install in your app

```bash
yarn add @bloobirds-it/flamingo-ui
```

## Usage

```jsx
import React from "react";
import { Button } from "@bloobirds-it/flamingo";

function Example() {
  return <Button />;
}
```
